item.title: TestCon Moscow 2019: Dismantling Cognitive Biases
item.description: Originally posted here. Developers and testers alike prefer to think of themselves as entirely rational beings, because both software development and software testing do require systematic rigor and logical reasoning. However, the reality is that the human element still comes into play when building and testing software.
